step.cmd: Create the new incident with the New Incident option with summary and the necessary details, then click Submit Now button in ICD.
The incident will be created with incident ID.
To map the ICD ticket with JIRA ticket, you need to create defect in JIRA by checking the checkbox and select the JIRA service URL.
Ensure that the newly created incident in ICD must be reflected in JIRA with the same ICDTICKETID field.
You can change the details of the defect in JIRA, then select the Start Progress option and add the comment (worklog).
Updates made for ticket ID through JIRA will be reflected in ICD.
